participant_1.background:
I took a long road trip to see the best sunsets of my life.
i am a short order cook at a local diner.
i have a wife and two kids back in the states.
I'm grateful to my parents for helping me out financially.
I get to wake up early and spend time with my little brother and sister before school.

participant_2.background:
I will not talk about my favorite food with others.
I am clumsy, but I make up for it with my cooking skills.
my husband is a firefighter.
i am allergic to milk.
i just bought a new house with my partner.

content.text: Good! I just moved to a new house with my husband.
That sounds fun! What are you most excited about?
My husband is a firefighter, so I'm excited to have a place where he can come home to after a long day of work.
That's so sweet! I'm glad you're happy in your new place.
Thanks! I'm trying to learn how to cook better.
Oh cool! I'm a short order cook at a local diner, so I can help you out with that.
Awesome! I'm allergic to milk, so I'm trying to find recipes that don't have it.
I know a few good ones! We should get together sometime and cook.
That sounds like a great idea! I'm free next weekend.
